Sorry Rica

Just picked up a typo under Our unique approach under our Bio's - Can you please change it to "As specialists, we work to understand"

Our Unique Approach

We appreciate that everyone experiences shoulder, elbow, biceps and hand conditions differently. As a specialists, we work to understanding your condition, lifestyle and what is most important.

Thank you

Kind Regards,

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Good afternoon,

I would appreciate your assistance with uploading my staff bio to our website. If a new tab can be created under "about" with my details I have copied into this email below my bio and photo is attached. Thank you

Alison- Practice Manager

With 17 years of experience in the medical industry, Alison is deeply passionate about providing exceptional patient care. As your first point of contact and working across our three consulting clinics, she warmly greets patients and ensures a seamless experience from initial consultation to surgery and follow-up care. Alison excels in managing the day-to-day operations of the clinic, always striving to create a welcoming and supportive environment.

When she's not at the clinic, Alison enjoys spending quality time with her two children, hitting the gym, and exploring her culinary skills in the kitchen.


Kind Regards,

Alison Jones
Practice Manager

Specialising in Shoulder, Elbow and Trauma Surgery

MBBS FRACS FAOrthA

Tel: 02 9159 9864 Fax: 9159 9865
